subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Checks the placement of right curly braces ('}') for code blocks. This check supports if-else, try-catch-finally blocks, switch statements, switch cases, while-loops, for-loops, method definitions, class definitions, constructor definitions, instance, static initialization blocks, annotation definitions and enum definitions. For right curly brace of expression blocks of arrays, lambdas and class instances please follow issue #5945. For right curly brace of enum constant please follow issue #7519.

tr.td: Specify the policy on placement of a right curly brace ('}').

subset of tokens
LITERAL_TRY , LITERAL_CATCH , LITERAL_FINALLY , LITERAL_IF , LITERAL_ELSE , CLASS_DEF , METHOD_DEF , CTOR_DEF , LITERAL_FOR , LITERAL_WHILE , LITERAL_DO , STATIC_INIT , INSTANCE_INIT , ANNOTATION_DEF , ENUM_DEF , INTERFACE_DEF , RECORD_DEF , COMPACT_CTOR_DEF , LITERAL_SWITCH , LITERAL_CASE .

subsection.name: Examples
subsection.p:
To configure the check with policy alone for else and
METHOD_DEF tokens:

pre.code: <module name="Checker"> <module name="TreeWalker"> <module name="RightCurly"> <property name="option" value="alone"/> <property name="tokens" value="LITERAL_ELSE, METHOD_DEF"/> </module> </module> </module>

subsection.p:
To configure the check with policy alone for
Switch Statements and Switch Cases:

pre.code: <module name="Checker"> <module name="TreeWalker"> <module name="RightCurly"> <property name="option" value="alone"/> <property name="tokens" value="LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_CASE"/> </module> </module> </module>

subsection.p:
To configure the check with policy alone_or_singleline for if and
METHOD_DEF tokens:

pre.code: <module name="Checker"> <module name="TreeWalker"> <module name="RightCurly"> <property name="option" value="alone_or_singleline"/> <property name="tokens" value="LITERAL_IF, METHOD_DEF"/> </module> </module> </module>

subsection.p:
To configure the check with policy alone_or_singleline for
Switch Statements and Switch Cases:

pre.code: <module name="Checker"> <module name="TreeWalker"> <module name="RightCurly"> <property name="option" value="alone_or_singleline"/> <property name="tokens" value="LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_CASE"/> </module> </module> </module>

subsection.name: Violation Messages
subsection.p: All messages can be customized if the default message doesn't suit you. Please see the documentation to learn how to.
